review_data.title: Langsam und überteuert

review_data.title: Hardly existing service
review_data.content: After waiting for 10 minutes finally a waiter came and wanted to take my order. In the middle of taking my order the head waiter came and told her not to take orders of tables that are not assigned to her and made her leave,...More

review_data.title: best avoided if you can
review_data.content: The staff ignored us for twenty minutes and took orders from people who had just arrived. They walk back and forward to and from the counter just to deliver an empty glass, passing tables of unserved customers. They have a monopoly on the departure level...More

review_data.title: Conveniently located between check-in and security
review_data.content: We had some time to kill before check-in and sat down on a comfortable sofa in the main seating area of the Bye Bye Bar. The area is surprisingly quiet, no noise, no herds of people rushing through. Friendly waiter was with us within minutes...More

review_data.title: Horrible service
review_data.content: The waiter did not bother coming for our orders so we ordered at the bar (for 16 peoples). However as soon as we finished, we were asked insistently to keep moving...AVOID THIS PLACE!

review_data.title: Great place to grab a coffee before passing through security
review_data.content: We were seeing a friend off from the airport. Having completed the check-in process, we had some time to kill, so stopped for a coffee at the Bye Bye Bar located right by the security gate near Check-In 2. Chairs are comfortable, surroundings equally so...More
